text: o visvasulara! Miru satyatiraskarula madiriga pravartincakandi; varu tama sodarulu eppudaina prayananlo unte, leda yud'dhanlo unte, (akkada varu edaina pramadaniki guri ayite) varini gurinci ila anevaru: "Okavela varu matopatu undivunte canipoye varu kadu mariyu campabadevarunu kadu!" Vatini (i vidhamaina matalanu) allah vari hrdaya avedanaku karanaluga cestadu. Mariyu allah ye jivanamicce vadu. Mariyu maranamicce vadu mariyu miru cestunnadanta allah custunnadu
